title: Han Soo-ann
text:
Han Soo-ann (18 June 1926 – 4 January 1998) was a <a href="South%20Korea">South Korean</a> <a href="boxing">boxer</a>.
Biography.
Han graduated from <a href="Sungkyunkwan%20University">Sungkyunkwan University</a> and served the military as an officer,making one of the first korean boxing teams in the navy.
Han competed for South Korea at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a> held in <a href="London">London</a>, <a href="United%20Kingdom">United Kingdom</a> in the flyweight event where he finished in third place. Han also competed for at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a> held in <a href="Helsinki">Helsinki</a>, <a href="Finland">Finland</a> in the flyweight event where he was a quarterfinalist.
